[all packages] [package zeta.form] [class hierarchy] [index]

pure interface of class zeta.form.TopLevelForm

The documentated page. 
public abstract class TopLevelForm
  extends CompoundForm
{
    public final Form subform;
    public final Style style;
    public static class Style
    public final String longDescr;
    public void setup(Session session);
    public abstract void perform(Session session,
                                 Locator locator)
      throws zeta.session.Failures.FormFailed;
    public TopLevelForm(Style style,
                        Form subform,
                        String longDescr);
    public static TopLevelForm make(Style style,
                                    Form subform,
                                    String longDescr,
                                    (Session, Locator) throws FormFailed -> void function);
    public static TopLevelForm make(Style style,
                                    Form subform,
                                    String longDescr,
                                    (Session) -> void setupFun,
                                    (Session, Locator) throws FormFailed -> void performFun);
    public int parse(Session session,
                     Locator locator,
                     String[] words,
                     int start)
      throws zeta.session.Failures.FormFailed;
    public String[] unparse(Session session);
    public Form[] getSubforms();
    public String getSyntax();
}
